title: Calculator SP for Android Wear
summary: Calculator - Simple yet powerful calculator for daily use for Android Wear
description: Simple yet powerful calculator for daily use.     - You can see all you typed - so very easy to make sure you are doing right.    - Undo what you did - it allows unlimited number of undo, so you don't have to retype everything. This is a perfect companion to fill the gap between ordinary calculator and spreadsheet. Works for Android Wear, Android Watch. Please look for Smartphone/Tablet version at http://goo.gl/CO5jeD
descriptionHTML:
Simple yet powerful calculator for daily use.
- You can see all you typed - so very easy to make sure you are doing right.
- Undo what you did - it allows unlimited number of undo, so you don't have to retype everything.


This is a perfect companion to fill the gap between ordinary calculator and spreadsheet. Works for Android Wear, Android Watch.


Please look for Smartphone/Tablet version at http://goo.gl/CO5jeD
comments: I Love It! This is the best calculater app for wear. I love how instead of using a watch for the icon you used a calc icon, it really makes it fit in with the stander apps.
Perfect üëç The best calc wear app I've tried.  Great UI.  Thanks dev. üòÅ
